nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith: Fortress Vader

Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith: Fortress Vader is the fifth and final story arc of Marvel Comics' series Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith. The arc is written by Charles Soule and will have art by Giuseppe Camuncoli, the arc started on August 8, 2018, and ended on December 19, 2018.
